abstract: With Judge Richard J. Holwell sentencing Raj Rajaratnam to 11 years in a federal prison for insider trading, he will try to remain out of prison as long as possible while lawyers prepare an appeal.
snippet: With Judge Richard J. Holwell sentencing Raj Rajaratnam to 11 years in a federal prison for insider trading, he will try to remain out of prison as long as possible while lawyers prepare an appeal.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods

lead_paragraph: Raj Rajaratnam is entering the next phase of his insider trading case.

headline.main: The Road Ahead for Raj Rajaratnam
